padded.name: Padded
padded.description: A simple armor consisting of quilted layers of cloth and padding. It is lightweight but offers minimal protection, primarily suited for stealthy individuals on a tight budget.

leatherArmor.name: Leather Armor
leatherArmor.description: Armor crafted from toughened leather, providing decent protection while remaining flexible. Ideal for adventurers who rely on mobility and stealth.

studdedLeather.name: Studded Leather
studdedLeather.description: This armor reinforces leather with metal studs or rivets, enhancing its protective capabilities while still allowing flexibility and movement.

hide.name: Hide
hide.description: Made from thick furs and pelts, hide armor offers robust protection and is favored by those who live close to nature.

chainShirt.name: Chain Shirt
chainShirt.description: A shirt made of interlocking metal rings, designed to be worn under normal clothing or leather armor for added protection.

scaleMail.name: Scale Mail
scaleMail.description: Composed of overlapping metal plates resembling fish scales, this armor provides solid protection but can be cumbersome and noisy.

breastplate.name: Breastplate
breastplate.description: A polished metal chest piece that offers substantial protection while remaining relatively lightweight. Popular among warriors who value balance between defense and mobility.

halfPlate.name: Half Plate
halfPlate.description: Comprising metal plates that cover vital areas while leaving some flexibility for movement, half plate armor offers strong defense at the cost of some mobility and stealth.

ringMail.name: Ring Mail
ringMail.description: A less sophisticated armor made of metal rings sewn onto a leather or cloth backing. It provides decent protection but is noisy and heavy.

chainMail.name: Chain Mail
chainMail.description: Full-body armor of interlocked metal rings that provides excellent protection. However, it requires significant strength to wear and hampers stealth.

splint.name: Splint
splint.description: Constructed from narrow vertical strips of metal riveted to a backing of leather or fabric, splint armor offers strong protection but restricts mobility.

plate.name: Plate
plate.description: The pinnacle of heavy armor, this suit of interlocking metal plates offers unmatched protection but requires exceptional strength and comes at a steep cost.

shield.name: Shield
shield.description: A small shield that can be used to block attacks and provide some protection from projectiles.
